law.catch_line: Certified association authorized to hold referendum.
law.text: Upon being certified by the Commissioner of Agriculture, the association shall be fully authorized and empowered to hold and conduct on the part of the producers of small grains a referendum on the question of whether the producers shall levy upon themselves an assessment under, and subject to, and for the purpose stated in KRS 247.5061 to 247.5095. The referendum shall be conducted on a statewide basis.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 397, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990.
